chart_description: This chart displays the virtual memory size, in MiB, used by different user groups on the system.

dimension_descriptions.1000: Virtual memory size used by user with the ID of 1000.
dimension_descriptions.32: Virtual memory size used by user with the ID of 32.
dimension_descriptions.65532: Virtual memory size used by user with the ID of 65532.
dimension_descriptions.65535: Virtual memory size used by user with the ID of 65535.
dimension_descriptions.81: Virtual memory size used by user with the ID of 81.
dimension_descriptions.996: Virtual memory size used by user with the ID of 996.
dimension_descriptions.997: Virtual memory size used by user with the ID of 997.
dimension_descriptions._chrony: Virtual memory size used by the chrony system service.
dimension_descriptions.cm: Virtual memory size used by the Connection Manager system service.
dimension_descriptions.libvirt: Virtual memory size used by the libvirt system service.
dimension_descriptions.messagebus: Virtual memory size used by the Message Bus system service.
dimension_descriptions.netdata: Virtual memory size used by the netdata system service.
dimension_descriptions.nobody: Virtual memory size used by the nobody user.
dimension_descriptions.root: Virtual memory size used by the root user.
dimension_descriptions.syslog: Virtual memory size used by the syslog system service.
dimension_descriptions.systemd-coredump: Virtual memory size used by the systemd-coredump system service.
dimension_descriptions.systemd-journal: Virtual memory size used by the systemd-journal system service.
dimension_descriptions.systemd-network: Virtual memory size used by the systemd-network system service.
dimension_descriptions.systemd-resolve: Virtual memory size used by the systemd-resolve system service.
dimension_descriptions.systemd-timesync: Virtual memory size used by the systemd-timesync system service.
dimension_descriptions.uuidd: Virtual memory size used by the UUID generator system service.
dimension_descriptions.vpopmail: Virtual memory size used by the vpopmail system service.
dimension_descriptions.xfs: Virtual memory size used by the XFS file system service.
